arts.ttl: 22-year-old defender left off West Ham PL squad list despite club rejecting offers
arts.sum: West Ham United have left Brazilian defender Luizao out of their 25-man Premier League squad list, despite reportedly rejecting bids for him over the past couple of transfer windows. The 22-year-old joined the Hammers in January 2023 after impressing across 20 games for Sao Paulo.
